		for (int i = 0; i < a.length(); i++) {

				int min = Math.min(first_append, second_append);

			}
		}

	}

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

class DynamicProgramming {
private:
vector<int> money = {1, 2, 3, 7}; // çº¸å¸ç§ç±»

public:
/**
* Description: å¯¹äºé‡‘é¢å›ºå®šï¼Œæ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å°‘é’±å¸æ•°åŠæ–¹å¼ã€‚
* prams: amountMoney- è¾“å…¥æ€»é‡‘é¢
* return: æ‰€éœ€æœ€å°çº¸å¸æ•°

int findFewerstMethod(int amountMoney) {
int c[amountMoney];
c[0] = 0;

int temp;
for (unsigned int i = 1; i < amountMoney; i++) {
// ç”¨æœ€å¤§å€¼åˆå§‹åŒ–
int tempMin = amountMoney;
for (unsigned int j = 0; j < money.size(); j++) {
int diff = i - money[j];
if (0 <= diff) {
temp = c[diff] + 1;
} else {
// æ­¤æƒ…å†µè¡¨ç¤ºè¯¥çº¸å¸æ— æ•ˆï¼Œé€‰æ‹©æœ€å¤§å€¼ã€‚
temp = amountMoney;
}
// æ±‚å‡ºæœ€å°å€¼
if (temp < tempMin) {
tempMin = temp;
}
}
c[i] = tempMin;
}

return c[amountMoney - 1];
}
};

// test
int main(void) {
DynamicProgramming test;
int res = test.findFewerstMethod(100);
cout << res << endl;
return 0;
}

def least_bills_recursion(total):
if total == 0:
return 0
if total < 0:
return sys.maxint
min_bills = min(1 + least_bills_recursion(total-2), 1 + least_bills_recursion(total - 3),

return min_bills

def least_bills_iteration(total):
current = 0
dp = [0] * (total + 1)
dp[2] = 1
dp[3] = 1
dp[7] = 1
for i in xrange(3, total+1, 1):
if i >= 7:
dp[i] = min(dp[i-2], dp[i-3], dp[i-7]) + 1
elif i >= 3 and i < 7:
dp[i] = min(dp[i-2], dp[i-3]) + 1
else:
dp[i] = dp[i-2] + 1
return dp[total]

public class Lesson10_2 {
/**
* åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’æ±‚æœ€å°é’±å¸æ•°
* @param c ç”¨ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„è®°å½•æ¯ä¸€æ­¥çš„æ€»é‡‘é¢ * @param value ç”¨ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„è®°å½•ä¸‰ç§é¢é¢çš„çº¸å¸
* @return
*/
public static int getMinMoney(int[] c, int[] value) {
int[] t = new int[3];
for (int i = 0; i < c.length; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < value.length; j++) {
if (i - value[j] >= 0) {
t[j] = c[i - value[j]] + 1;
}
}
int min = Math.min(t[0], t[1]);
min = Math.min(min, t[2]);
c[i] = min;
}
return c[c.length - 1];
}
public static void main(String[] args) {
int[] c = new int[100];
int[] value = new int[] { 2, 3, 7 };
System.out.println(getMinMoney(c, value)+1);
}
}

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>

using namespace std;

int dp_solve(int *a, int n, int aim){
vector<vector<int>> dp(n, vector<int>(aim+1, 0));

for(int j = 1; j <= aim; j++){
dp[0][j] = INT_MAX;
if(j >= a[0] && dp[0][j - a[0]] != INT_MAX)
dp[0][j] = dp[0][j - a[0]] + 1;
}

for(int i = 1; i < n; i++){
for(int j = 1; j <= aim; j++)
{
int tmp = INT_MAX;
if(j - a[i] >= 0 && dp[i][j - a[i]] != INT_MAX)
tmp = dp[i][j - a[i]] + 1;

dp[i][j] = min(dp[i-1][j], tmp);
}
}

return dp[n-1][aim] == INT_MAX ? -1 : dp[n-1][aim];
}

int min_res = INT_MAX;
void recur_solve(int *a, int n, int aim, int k){
if(aim == 0){
min_res = min(min_res, k);
return;
}
if(aim < 0)
return;
for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
aim -= a[i];
k++;
recur_solve(a, n, aim, k);
aim += a[i];
k--;
}
}

int min_res2 = INT_MAX;
void recur_solve2(int *a, int n, int aim, vector<int> res){
if(aim == 0){
int size = res.size();
min_res2 = min(min_res2, size);
return;
}
if(aim < 0)
return;
for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
res.push_back(a[i]);
recur_solve2(a, n, aim - a[i], res);
res.pop_back();
}
}

int main(){
int a[] = {2,3,7};
int sum = 25;
/***dpæœ€å¿«**/
cout << dp_solve(a, 3, sum) << endl;

/***è¿™ç§é€’å½’æœ‰ç‚¹ä¹…**/
recur_solve(a, 3, sum, 0);
cout << min_res << endl;

/**è¿™ä¸ªå¤ªä¹…äº†**/
vector<int> result;
recur_solve2(a, 3, sum, result);
cout << min_res2 << endl;
return 0;
}

private static int min(int[] data) {
boolean flag = true;
int min = -1;
for(int i=0;i<data.length;i++){
if(data[i]==-1){
continue;
}
if(flag){
min = data[i];
flag = false;
continue;
}
if(data[i]<min){
min = data[i];
}
}
return min;
}

private static void switchMoney(int mz1, int mz2, int mz3, int total) {
List<Integer[]> list = new ArrayList<Integer[]>();
int s1 = total / mz1;
int s2 = total / mz2 + 1;
int s3 = total / mz3 + 1;
for (int i = 0; i <= s1; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j <= s2; j++) {
for (int k = 0; k <= s3; k++) {
if (mz1 * i + mz2 * j + mz3 * k == 100) {
list.add(new Integer[] { i, j, k });
}
}
}
}
Integer[] result = new Integer[3];
int min = total;
for (Integer[] integers : list) {
int sum = 0;
for (Integer num : integers) {
sum += num;
}
if (min > sum) {
min = sum;
result = integers;
}
}
System.out.println("æœ€å°æ•°ï¼š" + min);
System.out.println(Arrays.toString(result));
}
}

public class Lesson10_2 {
public static int minCoinCount(int money, ArrayList<Integer> coinArray){
if (coinArray == null || coinArray.isEmpty() || money <= 0){
return -1;
}
int minCoinValue = Collections.min(coinArray);
if (money < minCoinValue){
return -1;
}

int[] c = new int[money+1];

for (int i=0; i<minCoinValue; i++){
c[i] = -1;
}

for (int i=minCoinValue; i<=money; i++){
ArrayList<Integer> coinNumList = new ArrayList<>(coinArray.size());
for (int coin : coinArray){
if (i == coin){
coinNumList.add(1);
} else if (i-coin>0 && c[i-coin]!=-1){
coinNumList.add(c[i-coin] +1);
}
}
c[i] = Collections.min(coinNumList);
}
return c[money];
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
ArrayList<Integer> coinArray = new ArrayList<>(3);
coinArray.add(2);
coinArray.add(3);
coinArray.add(7);
System.out.println(minCoinCount(100, coinArray));
}
}

function getStrDistance($a,$b) {
if ($a == null || $b == null) {
return -1;
}
$d = []; // ç”¨æ¥ä¿å­˜æ‰€æœ‰ç¼–è¾‘è·ç¦»

}

for ($i=0;$i<=strlen($a);$i++) {

}

$r = 1;
}

$second_append = $d[$i+1][$j] + 1;
$min = min($first_append,$second_append,$d[$i][$j]+$r);
$d[$i+1][$j+1] = $min;
}
}

}

```
def min_cb_array(total=100, notations=None):
if not notations:
notations = (2, 3, 7)

results = [[None] * len(fields) for _ in range(total)]

else:

results[i][-1] = min([value for value in results[i][:-1] if value],
default=0)
return results[total][-1]
```

```
def editing_distance(sa, sb):
if not sa or not sb:
raise ValueError('empty string')

lda = len(sa) + 1
ldb = len(sb) + 1

d = [[None] * ldb for _ in range(lda)]

for j in range(ldb):
d[0][j] = j

for i in range(lda):
d[i][0] = i

for i, ca in enumerate(sa):
for j, cb in enumerate(sb):
r = 0
if ca != cb:
r = 1
first_append = d[i][j + 1] + 1
second_append = d[i + 1][j] + 1
replace = d[i][j] + r

d[i + 1][j + 1] = min(first_append, second_append, replace)

return d[len(sa)][len(sb)]
```

public static int least_count(int num) {
if (num < 0)
return -1;
int len = num;
if (num < 9)
len = 8;
int[] c = new int[len + 1];
c[0] = -1;
c[1] = -1;
c[2] = 1;
c[3] = 1;
c[4] = 2;
c[5] = 2;
c[6] = 2;
c[7] = 1;
c[8] = 3;

if (num < 9) {
return c[num];
}

for (int i = 9; i <= num; i++) {
int a = c[i - 2] + 1;
int b = c[i - 3] + 1;
int min = Math.min(a, b);
int m = c[i - 7] + 1;
min = Math.min(min, m);
c[i] = min;
}

return c[num];
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
System.out.println(least_count(100));
}

import java.util.*;

public class MinCoins {
public static int[] arr={7,3,2};
public static int minNum=Integer.MAX_VALUE;
public static HashMap<Integer,Integer> min_map=new HashMap<Integer,Integer>();
public static void main(String []args) {
System.out.println("Coins:"+Arrays.toString(arr));
minCoins(0,11,new HashMap<Integer,Integer>());
System.out.println("MinCoins:");
for (Map.Entry<Integer,Integer>entry:min_map.entrySet()){
System.out.println(entry.getKey()+":"+entry.getValue());
}
}

public static void minCoins(int index,int aim,HashMap<Integer,Integer> map){
if(index==arr.length||aim==0){
if(aim==0){
int num=0;
for (Integer value:map.values())
num+=value;
if(num<minNum) min_map=map;
}
return;
}
for(int i=0;arr[index]*i<=aim;i++){
HashMap<Integer,Integer> new_map=(HashMap<Integer,Integer>)map.clone();
new_map.put(arr[index],i);
minCoins(index+1,aim-arr[index]*i,new_map);
}
}
}

import java.util.Arrays;


public class Lessonpratice_10_1 {

/**
* @Description: ä½¿ç”¨åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ï¼Œè§£å†³ç»™å®šé‡‘é¢æ±‚æœ€å°çº¸å¸æ•°é—®é¢˜
* @param C-ç»™å®šçš„é‡‘é¢ï¼Œm-ç»™å®šçš„å¯èƒ½çº¸å¸
* @return int-æœ€å°çº¸å¸æ•°
*/
public static int Getres_version1(int C, int[] m) {
if (C < 0) {
return -1;
}
if (C == 0) {
return 0;
}
int[] dp = new int[C + 1];
Arrays.fill(dp, (int)0x3f3f3f3f);
dp[0] = 0;
for (int i = 1; i <= C; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < m.length; j++) {
if (i >= m[j]) {
dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i - m[j]] + 1, dp[i]);
}
}
}
return dp[C];
}
/**
* @Description: ä½¿ç”¨è´ªå¿ƒç®—æ³•ï¼Œè§£å†³ç»™å®šé‡‘é¢æ±‚æœ€å°çº¸å¸æ•°é—®é¢˜
* @param C-ç»™å®šçš„é‡‘é¢ï¼Œm-ç»™å®šçš„å¯èƒ½çº¸å¸
* @return int-æœ€å°çº¸å¸æ•°
*/
public static int Getres_version2(int C, int[] m) {
if (C < 0) {
return -1;
}
if (C == 0) {
return 0;
}
Arrays.sort(m);
int left = C;
int idx = m.length - 1;
int res = 0;
while (true) {
if (left == 0) break;
int k = left / m[idx];
res += k;
left -= k * m[idx];
idx--;
}
return res;
}
public static void main(String[] args) {
int[] m = new int[]{2, 3, 7};
int C = 100;
System.out.println(Lessonpratice_10_1.Getres_version2(0, m));
}
}

// word1 â†’ word2
public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {
int len1 = word1.length();
int len2 = word2.length();

// å¤šå¼€ä¸€è¡Œä¸€åˆ—æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†ä¿å­˜è¾¹ç•Œæ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå³å­—ç¬¦é•¿åº¦ä¸º 0 çš„æƒ…å†µ
int[][] dp = new int[len1 + 1][len2 + 1];
// åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼šå½“ word2 é•¿åº¦ä¸º 0 æ—¶ï¼Œå°† word1 çš„å…¨éƒ¨åˆ é™¤å³å¯
for (int i = 1; i <= len1; i++) {
dp[i][0] = i;
}
// å½“ word1 é•¿åº¦ä¸º 0 æ—¶ï¼Œæ’å…¥æ‰€æœ‰ word2 çš„å­—ç¬¦å³å¯
for (int j = 1; j <= len2; j++) {
dp[0][j] = j;
}


char[] word1Array = word1.toCharArray();
char[] word2Array = word2.toCharArray();
// é€’æ¨å¼€å§‹ï¼Œæ³¨æ„ï¼šå¡«å†™ dp æ•°ç»„çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œç”±äºåˆå§‹åŒ–å¤šè®¾ç½®äº†ä¸€è¡Œä¸€åˆ—ï¼Œæ¨ªçºµåæ ‡æœ‰ä¸ªåç§»
for (int i = 1; i <= len1; i++) {
for (int j = 1; j <= len2; j++) {
// è¿™æ˜¯æœ€ä½³æƒ…å†µ
if (word1Array[i - 1] == word2Array[j - 1]) {
dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];
continue;
}
// å¦åˆ™åœ¨ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µä¸­é€‰å‡ºæ­¥éª¤æœ€å°‘çš„ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯ã€ŒåŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ã€çš„ã€Œæœ€ä¼˜å­ç»“æ„ã€
// 1ã€åœ¨ä¸‹æ ‡ i å¤„æ’å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦
int insert = dp[i][j - 1] + 1;
// 2ã€æ›¿æ¢ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦
int replace = dp[i - 1][j - 1] + 1;
// 3ã€åˆ é™¤ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦
int delete = dp[i - 1][j] + 1;
dp[i][j] = Math.min(Math.min(insert, replace), delete);

}
}
return dp[len1][len2];
}

}
return temp[amount - 1][money.length];
}

return _num + num/sorts[i]
else:
pass

package BasicThinking;


public class Lesson9_DP {
public static void main(String[] args) {
// String str1 = "mitcmu";
// String str2 = "mtacnu";
String str1 = "mouuse";
String str2 = "mouse";
char[] a = str1.toCharArray();
char[] b = str2.toCharArray();
int n = a.length;
int m = b.length;
int minDist = lwstDP(a,n,b,m);
System.out.println("æœ€å°ç¼–è¾‘è·ç¦»ä¸ºï¼š"+minDist);
}

public static int lwstDP(char[] a, int n, char[] b, int m) {
//è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„å­˜å‚¨æœ€å°ç¼–è¾‘è·ç¦»
int[][] minDist = new int[n][m];
//åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¬¬0è¡Œ:a[0..0]ä¸b[0..j]çš„ç¼–è¾‘è·ç¦»
for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
if (a[0] == b[j]) {
minDist[0][j] = j;
} else if (j != 0) {
minDist[0][j] = minDist[0][j - 1] + 1;
} else {
minDist[0][j] = 1;
}
}
// åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¬¬0åˆ—:a[0..i]ä¸b[0..0]çš„ç¼–è¾‘è·ç¦»
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
if (a[i] == b[0]) {
minDist[i][0] = i;
} else if (i != 0) {
minDist[i][0] = minDist[i - 1][0] + 1;
} else {
minDist[i][0] = 1;
}
}
//çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹å¼
for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
for (int j = 1; j < m; j++) {
if (a[i] == b[j]) {
int min= Math.min(minDist[i - 1][j] + 1, minDist[i][j - 1] + 1);
minDist[i][j] = Math.min(min,minDist[i-1][j-1]);
} else{
int min= Math.min(minDist[i - 1][j] + 1, minDist[i][j - 1] + 1);
minDist[i][j] = Math.min(min,minDist[i-1][j-1]+1);
}
}
}
return minDist[n-1][m-1];
}
}

```
public class Lesson10_1 {
private static final int[] coins = {2, 5, 9};

private static Map<Integer, Integer> hasCount = new HashMap<>();

public static Integer getCount(int total, int[] coins) {
if (hasCount.containsKey(total)) {
return hasCount.get(total);
}
if (total < 0) {
return null;
} else if (total == 0) {
return 0;
} else {
int length = coins.length;
Integer[] min = new Integer[length];
for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
Integer tmpResult = getCount(total - coins[i], coins);
min[i] = tmpResult != null ? (tmpResult + 1) : null;
}
List<Integer> resultList = Arrays.stream(min).filter(e -> e != null).collect(Collectors.toList());
Integer result = resultList.size() > 0 ? resultList.stream().mapToInt(e -> e).min().getAsInt() : null;
hasCount.put(total, result);
return result;
}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
Integer count = getCount(5, coins);
System.out.println(count);
}
}
```

int coin change(int[] coins, int coinNum, int account) {
vector<int> dp = vector<int>(account+1, account+1);

for (int i = 1; i<=account;i++) {
for (int j=0; j<coinNum; j++) {
if(i-coins[j] >=0) dp[i]= min(dp[i-coins[j]], dp[i]);
}
}
return dp[account] != account+1 ? dp[account] : -1;
}

package main

import (
"fmt"
"sort"
)

func main() {
num, notes := leastNotes(100, []int{2, 3, 7})
fmt.Println("Least number of notes required:", num)
fmt.Printf("They are: %v\n", notes)
}

func leastNotes(amount int, options []int) (number int, notes []int) {
// Prefer high denomination notes
sort.Sort(sort.Reverse(sort.IntSlice(options)))

notes = search(amount, options)
number = len(notes)
return
}

func search(amount int, sortedOptions []int) []int {
var result []int
for _, opt := range sortedOptions {
if amount < opt {
return nil
}

if amount == opt {
return []int{opt}
}

notes := search(amount-opt, sortedOptions)

// No result
if notes == nil {
continue
}

notes = append(notes, opt)
if result == nil || len(notes) < len(result) {
result = notes

// As we try high denomination notes first, whenever
// we find a result, no need to try other options which
// have low denomination.
break
}
}

return result
}

```
len_b = len(b) + 1

d[i][j] = min(d[i-1][j] + 1, d[i, j-1] + 1, d[i-1, j-1] + r)

return d
```

/**
* è®¡ç®—é‡‘é¢sumæ‰€éœ€æœ€å°‘çº¸å¸æ•°ç›®ï¼Œå­˜æ”¾äºæ•°ç»„ä¸­
*/
private static void countNum(int[] money, int sum, int[] dys, int[] dysMoney){
// è¾“å…¥çš„
if (sum < money[0]) {
return;
}
// åˆå§‹æ¡ä»¶
for (int aMoney : money) {
if (sum == aMoney) {
dys[sum] = 1;
dysMoney[sum] = sum;
return;
}
}
for (int i = 0; i < money.length; i++) {
dynamic(money, sum, dys, dysMoney, i);
}
}

/**
* åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’è®¡ç®—å½“å‰æœ€ä¼˜è§£
*/
private static void dynamic(int[] money, int sum, int[] dys, int[] dysMoney, int index){
int penny = money[index];
int nextSum = sum - penny;
if (nextSum >= money[0]) {
if (dys[nextSum] == 0) {
countNum(money, nextSum, dys, dysMoney);
}
if (dys[sum] == 0) {
dys[sum] = dys[nextSum] + 1;
dysMoney[sum] = money[index];
} else {
dysMoney[sum] = dys[sum] > dys[nextSum] + 1 ? money[index] : dysMoney[sum];
dys[sum] = Math.min(dys[sum], dys[nextSum] + 1);
}
}
}

package demo;

import java.util.Arrays;

public class Lesson10_2 {

public static void main(String[] args) {
int target = 101;
int[] coins = {3, 2, 7, 10};
System.out.println(getLeastCoins(target, coins));
}

public static int getLeastCoins(int target, int[] coins) {
Arrays.sort(coins);
int[] targetList = new int[target];
for (int i = 1; i <= target; i++) {
int minValue = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
for (int coin : coins) {
int result;
if (i < coin) {
result = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
} else if (i - coin == 0) {
result = targetList[0] + 1;
} else if (targetList[i - coin - 1] == 0) {
result = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
} else {
result = targetList[i - coin - 1] + 1;
}
minValue = Math.min(minValue, result);
}
targetList[i-1] = (minValue == Integer.MAX_VALUE ? 0 : minValue);
}
return targetList[target-1];
}
}

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int min_piece(int sum, int *value, int num)
{
int *c, i, j, gap, tmp;

c = malloc(sizeof(int) * (sum+1));
c[0] = 0;
for (i = 1; i <= sum; i++) {
c[i] = 0;
for (j = 0; j < num; j++) {
gap = i - value[j];
if (gap < 0) {
continue; /* ä¸å­˜åœ¨ */
} else if (gap == 0) {
c[i] = 1;
} else if (gap < i) { /* ä¸åº”è¯¥è¶…è¿‡i */
if (c[gap] <= 0) { continue; }
tmp = c[gap] + 1;
c[i] = (c[i] == 0 || c[i] > tmp) ? tmp : c[i];
}
}
printf("-- %d: %d\n", i, c[i]);
}
tmp = c[sum];
free(c);
return tmp;
}

/**
* äº¤ä½œä¸š
* @param moneyCnt é’±å¸æ€»é‡‘é¢
* @param coinValue é’±å¸é¢é¢
* @return int
*/
public static int getCoinChangeLeastCnt(int moneyCnt, int[] coinValue) {
if (moneyCnt <= 0) {
return 0;
}

int[] cnt = new int[moneyCnt + 1];

for (int i = 1; i <= moneyCnt; i++) {
int minCnt = moneyCnt, tempValue =moneyCnt;
for (int value : coinValue) {
if (value > i) {
tempValue = moneyCnt;
} else if (i - value >= 0){
tempValue = cnt[i - value] + 1;
}
if (tempValue < minCnt) {
minCnt = tempValue;
}
}

cnt[i] = minCnt;
}

return cnt[moneyCnt];
}

#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int dpSolve(int * a, int n, int aim){
vector<vector<int>> dp(aim+1, vector<int>(n+1, 0));
for(int i=0; i<=aim; i++){
int minvalue = INT_MAX;
for(int j=0; j<n; j++){
dp[i][j] = INT_MAX;
if(i >= a[j]){
if(i % a[j] == 0)
dp[i][j] = i / a[j];
if(dp[i-a[j]][n] != INT_MAX)
dp[i][j] = min(dp[i-a[j]][n]+1, dp[i][j]);
if(minvalue > dp[i][j]){
minvalue = dp[i][j];
}
}
}
dp[i][n] = minvalue;
}
return dp[aim][n];
}

int a[] = {1, 2, 5};
int sum[] = {2, 5, 7, 10, 20, 100};
for(int i=0; i<sizeof(sum)/sizeof(int); i++){
cout << "sum:" << sum[i] << " " << dpSolve(a, 3, sum[i]) << endl;
}
}

// åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’çš„ç»å…¸æ¨¡å‹-åŒºé—´æ¨¡å‹
// é’±å¸ç»„åˆ
// ç»™å®šæ€»é‡‘é¢å’Œå¯èƒ½çš„é’±å¸é¢é¢ï¼Œèƒ½å¦æ‰¾å‡ºé’±å¸æ•°é‡æœ€å°‘çš„å¥–èµæ–¹å¼ï¼Ÿ
// å‡è®¾è¿™é‡Œæˆ‘ä»¬æœ‰ä¸‰ç§é¢é¢çš„é’±å¸ï¼Œ2 å…ƒã€3 å…ƒå’Œ 7 å…ƒã€‚ä¸ºäº†å‡‘æ»¡100å…ƒæœ€å°‘çš„é’±å¸æ•°

class DP05: XCTestCase {

func countMoney(denomination: [Int], money: Int) -> Int {
var c: [Int] = Array(repeating: -1, count: money + 1)

for i in 1..<c.count {
var d = -1
for j in denomination {
if i < j { // é¢é¢æ¯”é’±å¤šï¼Œä¸èƒ½é‡‡ç”¨
continue
}
if c[i-j] == -1 { // å‡å»å½“å‰é¢é¢ï¼Œä¸èƒ½è¡¨ç¤ºã€‚
if i%j == 0 { // åˆšå¥½èƒ½è¢«è¿™ç§é¢é¢æ•´é™¤
d = i / j
}
} else {
// åŠ¨æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼Œæ³¨æ„d > 0è¯´æ˜å½“å‰é¢é¢èƒ½è¢«å…¶ä»–æ–¹æ¡ˆè¡¨ç¤ºã€‚
let new_d = c[i-j]+1
d = d > 0 ? min(d , new_d) : new_d
}
}
c[i] = d
}
for item in c.enumerated() {
print(item)
}

return c[money]
}

func testCountMoney() {
print(countMoney(denomination: [2,3,7], money: 100))
}
}

if tmp:

if target_money == 0:
return 0
elif target_money < min(coins):
return None # ä¸å­˜åœ¨æˆ–æ— è§£
elif target_money in coins:
return 1

result = list()
for j in coins:
count = min_coins_recruit(target_money - j, coins)
if count is None:
continue
else:
result.append(count)
if len(result) > 0:
return min(result) + 1
else:
return None # ä¸å­˜åœ¨æˆ–æ— è§£


def min_coins_dyna_pro(target_money, coins):
"""
å¯¹äºæ€»é‡‘é¢å›ºå®šï¼Œä½¿ç”¨åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ç®—æ³•ï¼Œæ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å°‘é’±å¸æ•°
:param target_money: æ€»é‡‘é¢å¤§å°
:param coins: å¯é€‰é¢é¢çš„é’±å¸åˆ—è¡¨
:return:
"""
if min(coins) > target_money:
return None
# æ¯ä¸ªé¢åº¦çš„é’±å¸æ•°ï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–å€¼ä¸º Noneï¼Œå‡è®¾ä¸å­˜åœ¨æˆ–æ— è§£
count = list([None]*(target_money+1))
# ä¸€äº›ç¡®å®šé¢åº¦çš„é’±å¸æ•°
count[0] = 0
for j in coins:
if j <= target_money:
count[j] = 1
# åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’æ±‚è§£é’±å¸æ•°
for i in range(min(coins) + 1, target_money+1):
tmp_count = list() # ä¸´æ—¶ä¿å­˜é’±å¸æ•°
tmp_coins = [j for j in coins if j <= i] # æ±‚è§£ count[i-j] æ—¶ï¼Œi-j å¤§äº 0
for j in tmp_coins:
if count[i-j] is not None:
tmp_count.append(count[i-j])
if len(tmp_count) > 0:
count[i] = min(tmp_count) + 1

return count[target_money]


# å¦‚ä½•è·å–é’±å¸ç»„åˆï¼Ÿ
if __name__ == "__main__":
print("åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ï¼Œæœ€å°‘é’±å¸æ•°ï¼š", min_coins_dyna_pro(50, [2, 3, 7]))

public int calculate(int[] coins, int totalValue) {
if (totalValue <= 0) {
return 0;
}

int[] dp = new int[totalValue + 1];

for (int i = 1; i <= totalValue; ++i) {
int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;

for (int j = 0; j < coins.length; ++j) {
if ((coins[j] <= i) && (dp[i - coins[j]] != Integer.MAX_VALUE)) {
min = Math.min(min, dp[i - coins[j]] + 1);
}
}

dp[i] = min;
}

return dp[totalValue];
}

void getLeastReward(const int *amount, int n, int target, int &least,
vector<int> &result, vector<int> &tmp) {

if (target < 0) return;
if (target == 0) {
if (tmp.size() < least) {
least = tmp.size();
result = tmp;
}
}

for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
if (target < amount[i]) continue;
int j = target / amount[i];
vector<int> rs = tmp;
while (j > 0) {
rs.push_back(amount[i]);
j--;
}
getLeastReward(amount, n, target % amount[i], least, result, rs);
}
}

void getLeastReward(const int *amount, int n, int target) {
if (target <= 0) return;
vector<int> rs, tmp;
int least = INT16_MAX;
getLeastReward(amount, n, target, least, rs, tmp);
cout << "\nThe least amount is " << least << endl;
cout << "Details are ";
for (int x: rs) {
cout << x << " ";
}
cout << endl;
}
